class.name: Monk
class.hitpoint_per_level: d8 + CON modifier or 5 + CON modifier

features.name: Martial arts
features.desc: You master combat styles that use unarmed strike and monk weapons, which gives you these benefits when unarmored and unshielded:

feature_data.name: Bonus unarmed strike
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can make an extra unarmed strike.

feature_data.name: Martial arts die
feature_data.desc: Instead of using your normal damage for an unarmed strike or monk weapon, you can use this die (1d6)

feature_data.name: Dexterous attacks
feature_data.desc: Use your DEX modifier instead of STR modifier for attack/damage rolls with unarmed strikes or monk weapons. When using the grapple or shove options, you can use your DEX for the save DC as well.

features.name: Unarmored defense
features.desc: While unarmored/unshielded, your base AC = 10 + DEX modifier + WIS modifier

features.name: Monks focus
features.desc: You harness energy represented by focus points. You can use these points for the following features:

feature_data.name: Flurry of blows
feature_data.desc: Using a focus point and a bonus action, you can make two extra unarmed strikes.

feature_data.name: Patient defense
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can take the disengage action. You can also spend one focus point to take both the disengage and dash actions.

feature_data.name: Step of the wind
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can take the disengage action. You can also spend one focus point to take both the disengage and dash actions. Your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

features.name: Unarmored movement
features.desc: While unarmored/unshielded, your speed increases. see the table to see how many ft of extra movement you gain

features.name: Uncanny metabolism
features.desc: When rolling for initiative you regain all expended focus points and gain an amount of hit points equal to the value of your martial arts die (after you rolled it, of course). Use once per long rest.

features.name: Monk Subclass
features.desc: Gain a subclass for your monk character

features.name: Deflect attacks
features.desc: Any attack that hits you that gives bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, you can reduce in damage by taking a reaction. The reduction is 1d10 + DEX modifier. If you reduce damage to 0, you can choose to expend a focus point and reflect the attack force to a creature within 5ft if it was a melee attack and 60ft if it was a ranged attack. The target must succeed on a DEX saving throw or take damage equal to twice your martial arts die (rolled) + DEX modifier

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Slow fall
features.desc: When you fall, take a reaction to reduce the fall damage by 5x your monk level

features.name: Extra attack
features.desc: You can attack twice when taking an attack action

features.name: Empowered strikes
features.desc: When dealing damage with your unarmed strike, it can deal force damage or normal damage.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Evasion
features.desc: When you have to make a DEX saving throw for something to take only half damage, you take no damage on success, and half damage on a fail. Does not work when incapacitated.

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Acrobatic movement
features.desc: While unarmored/unshielded, you can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling

features.name: Hightened focus
features.desc: You improve these features:

feature_data.name: Flurry of blows
feature_data.desc: Using a focus point and a bonus action, you can make three extra unarmed strikes.

feature_data.name: Patient defense
feature_data.desc: When you expend a focus point you gain temporary hit points equal to two rolls of your martial arts die

feature_data.name: Step of the wind
feature_data.desc: When you expend a focus point you can take a willing creature within 5ft of you with you until the end of your turn. this does not cause an opportunity attack.

features.name: Self restoration
features.desc: On each turn you can remove one of these conditions: charmed, frightened or poisoned

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Deflect energy
features.desc: Deflect attacks now also works against any other type of attack

features.name: Disciplined survivor
features.desc: You have proficiency for all saving throws and can use a focus point to reroll failed rolls.

features.name: Perfect focus
features.desc: When rolling for initiative and not using uncanny metabolism, you regain focus points until you have 4 if you have 3 or lower

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Superior defense
features.desc: You cna become immune to all damage except force damage by expending 3 focus points at the start of your turn. lasts for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated

features.name: Epic boon
features.desc: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat you qualify for.

features.name: Body and mind
features.desc: Your DEX and WIS scores increase by 4 to a max of 25.
